attributes.action: Provide FULL funding for the London Air Ambulance Service (HEMS)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The London air ambulance that responds from The Royal London Hospital, is a priceless lifesaving resource. The helicopter is not funded by the government at all, I believe that this service is more important to saving life that the hundreds of new speed cameras in place and being developed each year, The London air ambulance should get full and unrestricted funding for use.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
